document.heading: DC CIRCULATOR BUS JURISDICTION EXPANSION AMENDMENT ACT OF 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-182, the “DC Circulator Bus Jurisdiction Expansion Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-489, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and Transportation. The bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 2, 2010, and March 2, 2010, respectively. signed by the Mayor on April 7, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-381 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-182 became effective on May 27, 2010.
